column1: The Pit Room////Secret code for BBQ experts: when you whisper "burnt ends" to the staff at this Texas joint
column2: they know and give you what you need
column3: quite rare and not on the published menu. Go hungry
column4: get a beer and all the sides
column6: go home with some leftover as an evening snack. Make sure to try any of their special vegetables on the menu when possible. Lines can be long so go off hours or get takeout.
